Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    io.sentry.IHub
    please use IScopes instead
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    io.sentry.HubAdapter
    use ScopesAdapter instead
    io.sentry.HubScopesWrapper
    io.sentry.NoOpHub
    io.sentry.SentrySpanStorage
    please use SentryWeakSpanStorage (from sentry-opentelemetry-bootstrap) instead.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    io.sentry.cache.IEnvelopeCache.store(SentryEnvelope)
    io.sentry.cache.IEnvelopeCache.store(SentryEnvelope, Hint)
    io.sentry.HubAdapter.clone()
    please use IScopes.forkedScopes(String) or IScopes.forkedCurrentScope(String) instead.
    io.sentry.HubAdapter.popScope()
    please call ISentryLifecycleToken.close() on the token returned by ScopesAdapter.pushScope() or ScopesAdapter.pushIsolationScope() instead.
    io.sentry.HubScopesWrapper.clone()
    please use IScopes.forkedScopes(String) or IScopes.forkedCurrentScope(String) instead.
    io.sentry.HubScopesWrapper.popScope()
    please call ISentryLifecycleToken.close() on the token returned by IScopes.pushScope() or IScopes.pushIsolationScope() instead.
    io.sentry.IScopes.clone()
    please use IScopes.forkedScopes(String) or IScopes.forkedCurrentScope(String) instead.
    io.sentry.IScopes.popScope()
    please call ISentryLifecycleToken.close() on the token returned by IScopes.pushScope() or IScopes.pushIsolationScope() instead.
    io.sentry.NoOpHub.clone()
    please use IScopes.forkedScopes(String) or IScopes.forkedCurrentScope(String) instead.
    io.sentry.NoOpHub.getInstance()
    io.sentry.NoOpHub.popScope()
    please call ISentryLifecycleToken.close() on the token returned by IScopes.pushScope() or IScopes.pushIsolationScope() instead.
    io.sentry.NoOpScopes.clone()
    please use IScopes.forkedScopes(String) or IScopes.forkedCurrentScope(String) instead.
    io.sentry.NoOpScopes.popScope()
    please call ISentryLifecycleToken.close() on the token returned by IScopes.pushScope() or IScopes.pushIsolationScope() instead.
    io.sentry.protocol.User.getName()
    please use User.getUsername()
    io.sentry.protocol.User.setName(String)
    please use User.setUsername(String)
    io.sentry.Scopes.clone()
    please use IScopes.forkedScopes(String) or IScopes.forkedCurrentScope(String) instead.
    io.sentry.Scopes.popScope()
    please call ISentryLifecycleToken.close() on the token returned by IScopes.pushScope() or IScopes.pushIsolationScope() instead.
    io.sentry.ScopesAdapter.clone()
    please use IScopes.forkedScopes(String) or IScopes.forkedCurrentScope(String) instead.
    io.sentry.ScopesAdapter.popScope()
    please call ISentryLifecycleToken.close() on the token returned by IScopes.pushScope() or IScopes.pushIsolationScope() instead.
    io.sentry.Sentry.getCurrentHub()
    please use Sentry.getCurrentScopes() instead
    io.sentry.Sentry.popScope()
    please call ISentryLifecycleToken.close() on the token returned by Sentry.pushScope() or Sentry.pushIsolationScope() instead.
    io.sentry.Sentry.setCurrentHub(IHub)
    please use Sentry.setCurrentScopes(io.sentry.IScopes) instead.
    io.sentry.SentryOptions.setInstrumenter(Instrumenter)
    this should no longer be needed with our current OpenTelmetry integration. Use SentryOptions.setIgnoredSpanOrigins(List) instead if you need fine grained control over what integrations can create spans.
    io.sentry.SentryOptions.setTraceSampling(boolean)
    please use {SentryOptions.setTracePropagationTargets(List)} instead
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    io.sentry.SamplingContext(TransactionContext, CustomSamplingContext)
